title: ShareGo
author: Gojaehyun
excerpt: Tired of messy AirDrop steps? ShareGo makes file sharing stupidly simple and beautifully fast. Trigger it with a shortcut, drop a file, and boom—AirDrop just works. No setup, no Dock icon, no friction. Once you try it, there’s no going back.
